```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(EpiDynamics)
```

```{r}
parameters = list(beta = 2.5,
                  sigma = 0.0101, gamma = 0.2,
                  mu = 0.00005)
initials = c(S = 1,
             E = 0,
             I = 0,
             R = 0)
seir = SEIR(pars = parameters,init = initials, time = 0:(60*365))
PlotMods(seir)
```

```{r}
confirm = read.csv("confirm.csv")
covid.19.us = read.csv("covid_19_data.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(country_region == "US")
```

```{r}
population = read_csv("./population.csv") %>% 
  separate(state,into = c("dot", "state"), sep = 1) %>% 
  select(-dot) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  mutate(state = ifelse(state == "uerto Rico", "Puerto Rico",state))
```

```{r}
confirm %>% 

proportion = cbind(confirm, population)
```
